parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Distributed Relational Database Service (DRDS) instance.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time. Specify the time in the UNIX timestamp format. The time must be in UTC. Unit: ms.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description:
The performance monitoring metrics. You can specify one or more metrics for a query at a time. Separate multiple metric parameters with commas (,).

>  For more information about the details of performance monitoring metrics, see [Database monitoring](~~186704~~).

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time. Specify the time in the UNIX timestamp format. The time must be in UTC. Unit: ms.
